paragraphs: Warriors of the khaj, take heed!

Northern Elsweyr and lands beyond face an unprecedented threat. Dragons, criminals, and cave-dwelling beasts emerge from every corner of our beloved Anequina. As such, the citizen councils and local constabulary have gathered in Rimmen to offer rewards for actions taken in defense of the homeland!
Those with the time and the talent should make haste to Rimmen. <<1>> stands ready to answer any and all queries!
